p: A phase 3 randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial is evaluating the efficacy and safety of remdesivir in patients hospitalized with mild-to-moderate COVID-19 respiratory disease.[ 23] Remdesivir is given as 200 mg of loading dose IV on day 1, followed by 100 mg IV once daily as a maintenance dose for 9 days. The trial is expected to complete by the end of April 2020.
